item.title: CVE-2023-47526|2024-02-12T06:53:18.427Z -- chart%20builder%20team -- chartify%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20chart%20plugin
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Chart Builder Team Chartify – WordPress Chart Plugin allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Chartify – WordPress Chart Plugin: from n/a through 2.0.6.
